objectDesc.p: Ostracon, ?x?, 1 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 1 line(s) per column, 16 characters per line, written in Greek.

additions.p: Written on a lamp decorated with a frog.

history.provenance: Discovered at Miṣr written on a lamp.

sourceDesc.bibl: Lefebvre, Gustave, Recueil des inscriptions grecques-chrétiennes d'Égypte, no. 745, p. 750, Institut Francais d'Archeologie Orientale du Caire: Le Caire, Égypte, 1907. OCLC 7065867.
